name: Need a Healer!
description:
Have you ever played an online game, and found yourself forced to be the healer? 

Have you ever found yourself facepalming at your tank or DPS, who seem to just run madly after the first thing they see?

Have you ever found yourself pounding the desk in frustration, as your team seems oblivious to the hordes overwhelming your unarmored and unarmed self?

Have you ever done all this, and then thought "you know what would make this better? If I could take this experience offline, to play any time!"

Welcome to I Need a Healer, where the only class you can pick is healer, and your tank is hopeless.

Move with WASD, point and cast spells with mouse click.

Your teammate has three stats, health, stamina, and armor. Select spells with 1,2, and 3 to restore each of them. (Currently armor does nothing -.-)

Kill as many zombies as possible to get the best score!

Created for Untitled Game Jam #40
